title: Kick the butt to keep your teenager from smoking
content:
Source: dailyRx - 9 hours ago 
To Prevent Your Kids From Smoking, Kick the Habit Yourself New evidence suggests a parent's smoking habits may be a key factor in whether or not your child decides to start. A new study confirms that teens are more likely to smoke if their parents also smoke. On the other hand, it also found that an overwhelming majority of teens with non-smoking parents...
